profile:
The Garage Door Depot is Canada's largest and only national garage door Sales, Service & Installation company. We have locations in most major cities across Canada.
 
We offer residential consumer and commercial products and services.  So big or small, we're the one company to call!
 
The Garage Door Depot provides new and replacement garage doors, service for all brands of residential garage doors and garage door openers. We also stock a complete line of garage door parts and accessories. The Garage Door Depot offers a wide selection of garage doors at competitive prices.
 
The Garage Door Depot® is a proud member of the following professional organizations:
 
The Better Business Bureau 
The Institute of Door Dealer Education and Accreditation (IDEA) 
The International Door Association 
The Canadian Door Institute 
The Canadian Federation of Independent Business

profile:
Capital Garage Door Ottawa is always ready to take your call. With our professional 24/7 service and our experienced technicians who will do their best to accomplish any customer’s demands at a good price. We will make sure that our customers are left satisfied with our services in Ottawa valley area.

As local owned company, we offer residential and commercial services, that use the latest and most secure technology in our garage doors, garage door parts and electrical garage door opener systems. We guarantee our jobs are going to be done right and we are always ready to take your emergency call whenever, wherever. 

We offer repair of garage door systems and replacement of garage door openers in Greely, Barrhaven, Carleton Place, Richmond, Rockland, and other areas in and around Ottawa Valley, ON. Call our technicians today!

profile:
E&M CAPITAL is a locksmith and garage company operated by experienced technicians with more than 10 years of proven experience in the Canadian market. Ottawa based and family owned we put our clients needs and satisfaction as a top priority.  In any locksmith or garage problem our family will be happy to help your family providing expert advice, innovative solutions and excellent customer service including one year warranty for all parts and labor!

​
** E&M CAPITAL- Locksmith which provides a full range of residential and commercial locksmith services including custom locks, security doors, key-less entry systems, emergency locksmith services, hardware locks and much more.

** E&M CAPITAL Garage - offering all residential garage door repairs including replacement of broken cables and springs, openers, hinges and brackets, panel replacement and fresh installations of brand new door.

​
We are proud to serve our community in the Ottawa and Gatineau area.

We serve Clarence-Rockland, Russell, Carp, Kanata, Stittsville, Richmond, Munster, Malakoff, Manotick, Nepean, Bayshore, Centerpaointe, Carlington, Westboro, The Glebe, Alta Vista, Vanier, Overbrook, Greenbelt, Greely, Metcalfe, Gloucester, Greenbelt, Cumberland, Hull, Plateau, Aylmer, and Chelsea.

profile:
Al Parsons Electronics Ltd. is the leader in Ottawa and surrounding areas for sales and service of overhead doors, garage door openers and automatic entrance systems. In fact Al Parsons Electronics Ltd. has been recognized by the Consumers’ Choice Awards for Seventeen consecutive years for business excellence.  A family owned and operated business for over 60 years Al Parsons Electronics Ltd. prides itself on quality installations, commitment to customers, employees and suppliers.  

Our suppliers provide premium products that are durable and well-suited to the requirements of any project. 
We also offer upgrades, maintenance, and 24-hr repair service...contact us!
